subject: Olympic Games (2010)
Hockey, Ice
Television
Ratings and Rating Systems
lead_paragraph: Canada’s victory over the United States to win the Olympic men’s hockey gold medal on Sunday attracted the most viewers, 27.6 million, since the Miracle on Ice at the 1980 Winter Games.
snippet: Canada’s victory over the United States to win the Olympic men’s hockey gold medal on Sunday attracted the most viewers, 27.6 million, since the Miracle on Ice at the 1980 Winter Games.
